function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate preparation for each pandemic wave","Impact":"Increased risk of uncontrolled disease spread and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Developing robust contingency plans for each wave, implementing training and resource allocation strategies","Technologies":"Data-driven predictive analytics, communication and collaboration platforms, remote monitoring technologies","People":"Nursing managers, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Health organizations, government health departments"},{"Description":"Ineffective use of hotlines and sponsored advertisements for disease education","Impact":"Misinformation spreading, lack of public awareness, and failure to control disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement evidence-based educational campaigns, monitor and correct misinformation, engage with community leaders","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, data analysis platforms, public health communication software","People":"Public health educators, communication specialists, community leaders","Owner":"Ministry of Health, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of global coordination and response to pandemics","Impact":"Inadequate allocation of resources, delayed information sharing, and uneven distribution of vaccines and medical supplies","Mitigation":"Establishing international cooperation agreements, sharing best practices and data, developing global response protocols","Technologies":"International communication networks, real-time data sharing platforms, supply chain management systems","People":"Global health organizations, national governments, healthcare organizations","Owner":"International health agencies, national governments"}]}
